1.title: A Simple Chart
1.desc: A simple chart with all data embedded into the directive

2.title: A 3D Pie Chart
2.desc: A 3D pie chart using the datasource attribute from components scope

3.title: A Column, Line and Area Combi Chart
3.desc: A column, line and area combination chart using the datasource attribute

4.title: Fetch data from JSON URL
4.desc: Fetch data remotely from a JSON file or URL

5.title: Fetch data from XML URL
5.desc: Fetch data remotely from a XML file or URL
5.data:
<chart caption="Countries With Most Oil Reserves [2017-18]" subcaption="In MMbbl = One Million barrels" xaxisname="Country" yaxisname="Reserves (MMbbl)" numbersuffix="K" theme="fusion">
    <set label="Venezuela" value="290" />
    <set label="Saudi" value="260" />
    <set label="Canada" value="180" />
    <set label="Iran" value="140" />
    <set label="Russia" value="115" />
    <set label="UAE" value="100" />
    <set label="US" value="30" />
    <set label="China" value="30" />
</chart>

6.title: Update chart data from component
6.desc: Change the data dynamically in the component and watch the chart update automatically

7.title: Update chart attribute from component
7.desc: Change a parameter in the components variable and see it automatically update the chart

8.title: Trigger events from chart
8.desc: Hover on a plot to trigger an event in the component, and update variables

9.title: Percentage Calculation
9.desc: Hover on a plot to see the percentage value with respect to total

10.title: Export multiple charts
10.desc: Use Batch Export to export multiple charts as a single image/PDF

11.title: Add drill-down to chart
11.desc: Use LinkedCharts to quickly add drill-down to charts

12.title: A simple gauge
12.desc: A simple gauge to show customer satisfaction score

13.title: World Map
13.desc: World map showing data for different continents

14.title: Applying a different theme
14.desc: Choosing from different themes available in FusionCharts Suite

15.title: Change chart type at runtime
15.desc: Change the chart type after it has been rendered

16.title: Use annotations
16.desc: Highlight the day which had the highest footfall

17.title: Render Alert

18.title: Special events
18.desc: Drag a column column to see the change

19.title: Dynamically add chart event listener
19.desc: On clicking a button add an event listener to a chart to track â€˜dataplotClickâ€™

20.title: Slice data plots
20.desc: Click the button to slice out Microsoft from the rest of the plots
